*div1 type="summary"* *p*M. Slocum to Austin, March 13, 1827. Disclaiming responsibility for statements which he has published in his paper.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="03-13-1827"> March 13th 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir, I have understood from several *person_mentioned*persons */person_mentioned*that you were highly Displeased with the course which I have pursued relative to the late insurection in your province, in relation to the statements which have been made by me, in relation to your *location_mentioned*Collony*/location_mentioned*, in my paper—I can assure you Sir, if any eroneous statements have been made by me they were unintentional and that the columns of my *location_mentioned*paper */location_mentioned*will be open to any one who wishes to refute them—*/p*
*p*As to the communications which have appeared I am not responsible for no further than they go to impeach private character, and where that is done I shall always be ready to give up the *person_mentioned*author*/person_mentioned*—As for the Editorial part I defy any *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*to point to the sentence which speaks favourable to the measures of the far famed *person_mentioned*Fredonians*/person_mentioned*, but in admitting their proclamations I have done as other *person_mentioned*printers */person_mentioned*would and if they have in anny manner injured the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*by their statements it will afford me pleasure to give any communications which may be made to refute them, an insertion—.*/p*
*p*If you feel disposed to encourage my *location_mentioned*paper */location_mentioned*I should be happy to get you to use your influence in your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*and the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned* generally, to extend its circulation—I[f] you feel disposed to do so please to inform me and I will send you *location_mentioned*papers */location_mentioned*for this purpose*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M Slocum*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches, Texas.*/location_mentioned**/p*
